description:
I loved seeing our guest director Mike pair up newbie Drew with mega-hung Bryce. Drew certainly liked what Bryce was packing and threw himself into the proceedings with gusto.

As Bryce hauls it out, Drew says 'your cock looks amazing,' so Bryce, without missing a beat, says 'Why don't you suck it?'

'Don't mind if I do!' Drew says, as he latches onto Bryce's dick with his mouth like a pro.

Now, while we only see oral action in this video, there's a promise of something more at the end. Mike asks Bryce if he wants to fuck Drew, and Bryce says he 'thinks so . . . if he can handle it.' Drew laughs, saying 'That's the question!' Mike goes further, asking if Drew would want to fuck Bryce, and he's down for whatever. So, looks like we might see these two doing more than just sucking soon enough!
title: Bryce & Drew
